title: Yuu☆Yuu☆Hakusho: Eizou Hakusho II
synopsis: Eizou Hakusho II actually consists of four separate volumes. Each volume focuses around one of the main characters; Yusuke, Kurama, Hiei, or Kuwabara. Each episode is basically recap about the specific character's involvement in the series.
